courseMode.controlled_vocab:
- "online", "onsite" or "blend of online and onsite" 
- "synchronous" or "asynchronous"
- "full-time" or "part-time"

description.example: "description": "An instance of a course being ran in an institution Y in the Fall 2020 onsite"

eventStatus.controlled_vocab:
- postponed
- cancelled
- date TBD
- application open 
- registration closed

name.example: "name": "RNA-seq data analysis in R in Autumn 2020 CS101"

offers.controlled_vocab: Currency and value, Date specified price
